snippet: Asians must unite in pushing Beijing to avoid hostilities in the South China Sea.
abstract: Editorial criticizes China for fanning hostilities with other Asian nations by making sweeping sovereignty claims in the South China Sea; underscores need for Asian countries to unite in pushing China to avoid hostilities in the region.
lead_paragraph: Asians must unite in pushing Beijing to avoid hostilities in the South China Sea.

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations
